haReport:
This mission was flown by:
Kmdr Patrik Schorner
Fw Ruprecht Hess

 The mission was flown from Balatre aerodrome.

Successes include the following: 
On 02/09/1916 near Verdun aerodrom.
A F.E.2b of Esc 13 was brought down by Eberhardt Stockert of Jasta 16b.
S/Lt Samuel Lacombrade was killed in action.
S/Lt Aime Lacombre was killed in action.
Eberhardt Stockert was  flying a Halberstadt D.II.
